snippet: The government said it had asked the Supreme Court to establish a panel to try Gen. Pervez Musharraf on accusations that he subverted the Constitution.
abstract: Pakistan’s government says it is initiating a treason prosecution of former ruler Gen Pervez Musharraf, groundbreaking assertion of civilian supremacy over powerful Pakistani military; Musharraf is accused of subverting Constitution in 2007 when he imposed military rule and fired much of judiciary.
lead_paragraph: The government said it had asked the Supreme Court to establish a panel to try Gen. Pervez Musharraf on accusations that he subverted the Constitution.

headline.main: Warnings of New Turmoil as Pakistan Pursues a Treason Case for Musharraf
headline.print_headline: Warnings of New Turmoil as Pakistan Pursues a Treason Case for Musharraf
